bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition with a swollen and painful throat. Shang han zong bing lun 傷寒總病論 3: 古方煎，治咽喉腫痛九種 疾.九般名：急喉閉、纏喉風、結喉、爛喉、重舌、木舌、遁蟲、蟲喋、 飛絲入喉 , “Among ancient recipes ‘black dragon decoction’ served to cure nine types of swollen and painful throat. The names of these nine types are: acute throat closure, throat-constricting wind, bound throat, festering throat, doubled tongue, wooden tongue, run-away bug , floating worm-borer, and flying silk threads entering the throat”.
